title: A Digital Twin for Assessment of Remaining Useful Life of Offshore Wind Turbines Structure.
content: This paper delves into the application of digital twin monitoring techniques for enhancing offshore floating wind turbine performance, with a detailed case study. We explore the practical implementation of digital twins and their efficacy in optimizing operations and predictive maintenance. Our findings emphasize digital twins' potential as a valuable tool for renewable energy, driving efficiency and sustainability in offshore floating wind installations.
